original_text: So the angel moved his sharp knife over the earth. He cut off the grapes which grew in the earth's vineyard. He threw the grapes into the winepress where God stamps on the grapes because he is very angry.
korean_text: 천사가 낫을 땅에 휘둘러 땅의 포도를 거두어 하나님의 진노의 큰 포도주 틀에 던지매

sentences.original_text: So the angel moved his sharp knife over the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 천사가 그의 날카로운 칼을 땅 위로 움직였습니다

sentences.original_text: which grew in the earth's vineyard
He threw the grapes into the winepress
where God stamps on the grapes
